scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd /Users/matiaslang/Desktop/GIT/FullStack2019/Osa_3/sandboxFront && npm run build --prod && cp -r build /Users/matiaslang/Desktop/GIT/FullStack2019/Osa_3/sandbox
